{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = NVIDIA Jetson TX1 Developer Kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/jetson-tx1-developer-kit |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = nVIDIA |model = Jetson |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = TX1 Development Board |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |wlclass = AC1200 |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VOB-P2180 |icid = 7361A-P2180 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;Tegra X1; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v8<!-- 4x ARM Cortex-A57 4x ARM Cortex-A53 --> |cpu1spd = 1.9 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:4B |oui = 00:04:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = PCIe x4, Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5.5-19.6 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.74 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, J7
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, MIPI CSI, GPIO, I2C, I2S, SPI, heatsink, fan, Bluetooth 4.0, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/05/2015 |estreldate = 11/2015 |estprice = 599 |upc = 812674020198 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16813190006 |asin = B017NWO6LG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [https://docs.nvidia.com/jetson/archives/l4t-archived/l4t-283/Tegra%20Linux%20Driver%20Package%20Development%20Guide/baggage/Jetson_TX1_and_TX2_Developer_Kits_User_Guide.pdf User Guide]
==See also== :[[List of Single-board computers]] *''[[nVIDIA Jetson TK1]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra K1 ''Logan'' (Quad Core, 4+1-cores) :4x ARM Cortex-A15 @2.3GHz, 1x "Low-Power Core", 5 (4+1) cores; :GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GK20A ''Kepler'' (192x CUDA) @950MHz; RAM: 2GB (DDR3L) *''[[nVIDIA Jetson TX1 Development Board]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X1 ''Erista'' (Quad Core, 4-cores) :4x ARM Cortex-A57 @1.9GHz; 4 cores; :GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GM20B ''Maxwell'' (256x CUDA) @1GHz; RAM: 4GB (LPDDR4) *''[[nVIDIA Jetson TX2]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X2 ''[https://www.anandtech.com/show/10596/hot-chips-2016-nvidia-discloses-tegra-parker-details Parker]'' (Quad Core, 4+2-cores) :4x ARM Cortex-A57 @2.0GHz, 2x Denver 2 @2.0GHz; 6 (4+2) cores; :GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GP10B ''Pascal'' (256x CUDA) @1.4GHz; RAM: 8GB (LPDDR4) *''[[nVIDIA Shield (P2897)]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X1 (Quad Core, 2x 4-cores) :FCC ID: VOB-P2897 (2016-08-29) - ''Game Console'' :Flash: 16GB, RAM: 3GB; WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac (2T2R) :Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0, HDMI *''[[OUYA Game Console (OUYA1)]]'' - [[nVIDIA]] Tegra 3 (Quad Core) @1.7GHz :4x ARM Cortex-A9; GPU: [[nVIDIA]] GeForce (ULP); RAM: 1GB (DDR3)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
